title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: A dead bush grew to spread across the stairway when it lived.  Sliced limbs mark where others have cut their way through the obstacle.  Strangely, a pile of complete skeletons rest on the hill directly below the long-dead bush.  The night fog hangs heavily around the skeletons.
